## ParticleMaterial.supportInstancing() method

Particles are not instanced via material instancing. Each particle system is expected to provide per-particle data through vertex attributes instead.

**Signature:**

```typescript
supportInstancing(): boolean;
```
**Returns:**

boolean

False always.
